alert.note: Alert for Kaufman; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 1:27PM CDT until June 13 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kaufman County in north central Texas... Northwestern Van Zandt County in north central Texas... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 126 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Terrell, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Terrell, Kaufman, Canton, Wills Point, Talty, Edgewood, Fruitvale, New Terrell City Lake, Lake Tawakoni, Myrtle Springs, Elmo, Post Oak Bend City, Oak Ridge, Ola, Lawrence and Alsa. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 493 and 530. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
